t_video_highlights::clip_card_0::goals[0: Show a location or the community that your story is about.
t_video_highlights::title: Highlights Video
t_video_highlights::clip_card_1::goals[0: Show the main character(s) in your story.
t_video_highlights::text_card_0::text: This template will help you capture the best moments in your story. Highlights stories are structured less to illustrate a clear story line and more to show the peak moments or most dramatic aspects of the topic. In video, highlights stories are typically carried by narration.
t_video_highlights::clip_card_6::goals[0: Ask another relevant character to talk about the story.
t_video_highlights::clip_card_2::goals[0: Show something that sums up the the importance of the story.
t_video_highlights::clip_card_5::goals[0: Show the character engaged in an activity relevant to the story.
t_video_highlights::clip_card_7::goals[0: Show something that sums up or concludes the story.
t_video_highlights::clip_card_4::goals[0: Ask a relevant character to talk about the story.
t_video_highlights::clip_card_3::goals[0: Show character(s) engaged in an activity relevant to the story.
